description: This file defines a React component 'ApiTokenForm' that provides a form interface for users to input API credentials for Jira or Confluence, handle validation, and authenticate via a backend API endpoint.

methods.name: validateForm
methods.description: Validates user input for domain, email, and API token fields.

methods.name: handleInputChange
methods.description: Handles changes in input fields, updating form data and clearing validation errors.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission: validates inputs, performs authentication API call, and manages loading/error states.
